moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.
